operating_mode: 3-Wire CS Mode Without Busy Indicator (SDI High)

causality.effect: SDO exits high-impedance state and outputs the Most Significant Bit (MSB, D15).

causality.trigger: Each subsequent falling edge of SCK (from 1st to 15th)
causality.effect: The next sequential data bit is output on SDO.

causality.trigger: 16th falling edge of SCK or a rising edge on CNV, whichever is earlier
causality.effect: SDO returns to a high-impedance state.

constraints.t_EN: SDO Enable Time (from CNV falling edge to SDO valid)
constraints.t_HSDO: SDO Hold Time (from SCK falling edge)
constraints.t_DSDO: SDO Data Valid Time (from SCK falling edge)
constraints.t_DIS: SDO Disable Time (from 16th SCK falling edge or CNV rising edge)
